html:
2025-0909
2025-12-05CIRNACOther Than Statutory AuthorityOrder Consenting to the Amendments of the Tla’amin Final AgreementOrder consenting to the amendments of the Tla’amin Final Agreement (Treaty) in order to (1) expand jurisdiction in Child and Family Services program delivery; (2) acknowledge that the Treaty is a living agreement and provides a foundation for evolution and an ongoing relationship amongst the Government of Canada, the Government of British Columbia and the Tla’amin Nation; and (3) incorporate specific Tla’amin language terminology throughout the Treaty.N/A
subject: Order Consenting to the Amendments of the Tla’amin Final Agreement
precis: Order consenting to the amendments of the Tla’amin Final Agreement (Treaty) in order to (1) expand jurisdiction in Child and Family Services program delivery; (2) acknowledge that the Treaty is a living agreement and provides a foundation for evolution and an ongoing relationship amongst the Government of Canada, the Government of British Columbia and the Tla’amin Nation; and (3) incorporate specific Tla’amin language terminology throughout the Treaty.
